program_sections.title: How to Earn Points
program_sections.content:
Earn BrewVi Rewards points on every purchase:

**Standard Earning Rate:**
- 1 point per $1 spent (before tax and shipping)
- Example: $50 order = 50 points

**Bonus Earning Opportunities:**
- Auto-delivery subscribers: 2X points (2 points per $1)
- First purchase: 50 bonus points
- Birthday month: 3X points on all purchases
- Referral program: 100 points per successful referral
- Product reviews: 10 points per review (limit 5/month)

**Points Post:**
- Points are added to your account when order ships
- Bonus points may take 24-48 hours to appear
- Returns: Points are deducted when refund is processed
program_sections.quick_answer: Earn 1 point per $1 spent. Auto-delivery subscribers earn 2X points. Bonus opportunities: referrals (100 pts), reviews (10 pts), birthday month (3X).

program_sections.title: Redeeming Your Points
program_sections.content:
Redeem your points for discounts at checkout:

**Redemption Rates:**
- 100 points = $5 discount
- 200 points = $10 discount
- 500 points = $25 discount
- 1000 points = $50 discount

**Redemption Rules:**
- Minimum redemption: 100 points ($5)
- Can combine with other offers (sale prices, free shipping)
- Cannot be applied to gift cards or shipping fees
- Points expire 12 months after earning
- Auto-delivery orders: Cannot redeem on recurring shipments (one-time purchases only)

**How to Redeem:**
1. Add items to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Select 'Use Rewards Points' option
4. Choose point amount to redeem
5. Discount applied automatically
program_sections.quick_answer: Redeem at checkout: 100 points = $5 discount. Minimum 100 points. Cannot apply to gift cards or shipping.

program_sections.title: Checking Your Points Balance
program_sections.content:
View your current points balance and activity:

**Check Your Balance:**
- Account Dashboard: View total points and upcoming expirations
- Email Receipts: Points earned shown on order confirmations
- Mobile App: Real-time balance updates (coming soon)

**Points Activity:**
- Transaction history: See all points earned and redeemed
- Pending points: Points from recent orders not yet posted
- Expiring points: Points expiring in next 30 days highlighted

**Balance Notifications:**
- Email alerts when you reach 100, 500, 1000 points
- Monthly balance summary (opt-in)
- Expiration warnings 30 days before points expire
program_sections.quick_answer: Check your balance in Account Dashboard or order confirmation emails. You'll receive alerts at 100, 500, and 1000 points.

program_sections.title: Loyalty Tiers
program_sections.content:
Advance through tiers to unlock exclusive benefits:

**Bronze (0-499 points annually):**
- 1 point per $1 (standard rate)
- Birthday bonus: 50 points
- Early access to sales (1 day)

**Silver (500-999 points annually):**
- 1.5 points per $1 (50% bonus)
- Birthday bonus: 100 points
- Early access to sales (2 days)
- Free expedited shipping (1x per quarter)

**Gold (1000+ points annually):**
- 2 points per $1 (double points)
- Birthday bonus: 200 points
- Early access to sales (3 days)
- Free expedited shipping (unlimited)
- Priority customer support
- Exclusive product access

**Tier Calculation:**
- Based on points earned in rolling 12-month period
- Tier status reviewed monthly
- Downgrading: If points drop below tier threshold for 3 consecutive months
program_sections.quick_answer: Three tiers: Bronze (0-499 pts), Silver (500-999 pts), Gold (1000+ pts). Higher tiers earn faster and get exclusive benefits.

program_sections.title: Points Expiration Policy
program_sections.content:
Keep your points active with regular activity:

**Expiration Rules:**
- Points expire 12 months after earning date
- Oldest points redeemed first (FIFO - First In, First Out)
- Account activity (purchase or redemption) does NOT extend expiration

**Preventing Expiration:**
- Redeem points before they expire
- Auto-delivery subscriptions: Earn points monthly to maintain balance
- Make at least one purchase annually to keep account active

**Inactive Accounts:**
- No purchases for 24 months = account marked inactive
- Inactive accounts: All points expire immediately
- Reactivate by making a purchase

**Expiration Notifications:**
- 60 days before expiration: First warning email
- 30 days before expiration: Second warning email
- 7 days before expiration: Final reminder email
program_sections.quick_answer: Points expire 12 months after earning. You'll receive warnings at 60, 30, and 7 days before expiration.

program_sections.title: Referral Rewards
program_sections.content:
Earn bonus points by referring friends:

**How It Works:**
1. Get your unique referral link from Account Dashboard
2. Share with friends via email, social media, or text
3. Friend makes first purchase using your link
4. You both earn rewards!

**Referral Rewards:**
- You earn: 100 bonus points per successful referral
- Friend earns: 50 bonus points + 10% off first order
- Unlimited referrals (no cap)

**Referral Requirements:**
- Friend must be new customer (no prior purchases)
- Friend's first order must be $25 minimum
- Points post after friend's order ships
- Friend must use your unique link (not just promo code)

**Tracking Referrals:**
- View referral status in Account Dashboard
- See pending, completed, and total referrals
- Track total points earned from referrals
program_sections.quick_answer: Earn 100 points per successful referral. Your friend gets 50 points + 10% off. Share your unique link from Account Dashboard.

program_sections.title: Auto-Delivery Subscription Benefits
program_sections.content:
Auto-delivery subscribers get enhanced rewards:

**Exclusive Benefits:**
- 2X points on all purchases (not just auto-delivery orders)
- Tier status calculated at 2X rate (reach Gold faster)
- Points never expire while subscription is active
- Early access to limited edition products
- Free shipping on ALL orders (subscription and one-time)

**How Auto-Delivery Affects Rewards:**
- Subscription orders earn 2X points automatically
- One-time purchases also earn 2X (as long as subscription is active)
- Can still redeem points on one-time purchases
- Cannot redeem points on recurring subscription orders

**Maintaining Benefits:**
- Benefits active as long as subscription is not cancelled
- Pausing subscription: Benefits remain active during pause
- Cancelling subscription: Benefits end, points revert to 12-month expiration

**Example:**
- $50 auto-delivery order = 100 points (2X rate)
- Bronze tier requires 0-499 points; Gold requires 1000 points
- With 2X earning, reach Gold in half the spending
program_sections.quick_answer: Auto-delivery subscribers earn 2X points on ALL purchases and enjoy no expiration dates while subscribed.

program_sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
program_sections.content:
**Can I combine rewards with sales and promotions?**
Yes! Points can be redeemed on sale items and combined with promotional discounts.

**What happens to my points if I return an order?**
Points earned from the returned order are deducted from your balance when the refund is processed.

**Can I transfer points to another account?**
No, points are non-transferable and tied to your account.

**Do I earn points on shipping and taxes?**
No, points are earned on product subtotal only (before tax and shipping).

**Can I use points for gift cards?**
No, rewards cannot be redeemed for gift card purchases.

**What if I forgot to use my points at checkout?**
Contact customer support within 24 hours of order placement and we can apply points retroactively.

**Do points expire if I'm an auto-delivery subscriber?**
No! Your points never expire as long as your subscription remains active.

**How do I opt out of the rewards program?**
Contact customer support to opt out. All points will be forfeited upon opting out.
program_sections.quick_answer: Yes, combine with sales. Returns deduct points. Points non-transferable. Contact support for help.
